definition: to endanger/to jeopardize/a danger (to life, national security etc)

sentences.english: It can also be flown into areas that are under fire without risk to aircrew.
sentences.chinese: 它也能在不危及飛行員生命的情況下飛進交戰區域裏。

sentences.english: A fault in the wheel flat of a railroad car would threaten the safety of the car.
sentences.chinese: 鐵道車輛踏面平輪故障危及列車行車安全。

sentences.english: Publishing it also could endanger Google employees in China, she said.
sentences.chinese: 出版也可能危及中國谷歌的員工，她說。

sentences.english: Antinori's determination to clone threatens his current livelihood.
sentences.chinese: 安蒂諾里堅持克隆人的決心已危及到他目前的生計。

sentences.english: With immediate treatment, the fever may prove nonfatal.
sentences.chinese: 要是馬上治療的話，發燒不會危及到生命。

sentences.english: The seepage of Huojia reservoir main dam was seriously and influenced the dam safety.
sentences.chinese: 火甲水庫主壩滲漏，嚴重危及大壩安全。

sentences.english: Tuberculous empyema with hemothorax is scarce in clinic, but it often does great harm to the patients.
sentences.chinese: 結核性膿胸合併血胸臨牀少見，常嚴重危及患者生命。

sentences.english: More than two unexcused absences will seriously jeopardize your class participation grade.
sentences.chinese: 超過兩次無故缺課將嚴重危及你的課堂參與評分。

sentences.english: In pelvic fractures, the most common life-threatening complication is bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 對於骨盆骨折，失血爲最常見的危及生命的併發症。

sentences.english: The polluted air in the city badly endangers the health of the people.
sentences.chinese: 城市中被污染的空氣嚴重地危及人民的健康。

sentences.english: Bio -energy based on the grain has had the tendency of endangering the food security.
sentences.chinese: 以糧食爲基礎的生物能源已有危及糧食安全的傾向。

sentences.english: Without using any harmful chemical substances, please feel relieved about usage.
sentences.chinese: 沒有使用任何可能危及健康的化學物質，請放心使用。

sentences.english: Water pouring is an important factor endangering mine.
sentences.chinese: 井下湧水是危及礦井安全的重要因素。

sentences.english: Heat stroke is a life-threatening illness.
sentences.chinese: 中暑是危及生命的嚴重疾病。

sentences.english: Last but not least, it endangers children's physical development.
sentences.chinese: 最後但並非最不重要的，這會危及孩子們的身體發育。

definition: to jeopardize/to harm/to endanger/harmful effect/damage/CL:個|个[ge4]
in imminent peril (idiom)/on the brink of crisis
cannot maintain (sth)/unable to keep/more likely than not/may well
